p: On behalf of the Missouri Association of Teachers of English, I want to express my deep appreciation to you for writing the introduction to our special Bulletin of Missouri Writers.

I shall send you a copy as soon as it is published. I hope to have it done for our meeting in St. Louis when the State Teachers Association meets on November 6 and 7. However, it will all depend on the printer, and we may have to wait until a later date.
I sincerely hope you are recovering satisfactorily from your eye surgery.
